alert.note: Alert for Massac (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 4:26AM CDT until August 05 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Massac County in southern Illinois... Eastern Ballard County in western Kentucky... Western McCracken County in western Kentucky... * Until 515 AM CDT. * At 425 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of La Center, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... La Center, Barkley Regional Airport, West Paducah, Lovelaceville, Kevil and Joppa. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
